timeline.message:
Create ApiMediationClient.isRegistered

Uses EurekaClient.getInstanceRemoteStatus to test for registration with the Discovery Service.

Signed-off-by: Carson Cook <carson.cook@ibm.com>

Create test API endpoint in discoverable client

Creates a new endpoint to test registration to the Discovery Service via the API Mediation Client.

Signed-off-by: Carson Cook <carson.cook@ibm.com>

Remove unused config reader property

Signed-off-by: Carson Cook <carson.cook@ibm.com>

Add tests for mediation client endpoint in discoverable client

Signed-off-by: Carson Cook <carson.cook@ibm.com>

Create ApiMediationService unit tests

Signed-off-by: Carson Cook <carson.cook@ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Can we please change the hardcoded items and take them from the discoverable client configuration where it makes sense?
timeline.author: jandadav
